column2: b'Merc Storia: Mukiryoku no Shounen to Bin no Naka no Shoujo'

b'Merc Storia takes places in a world where humans and monsters coexist. The protagonist, Yuu, is a healer apprentice and possesses the ability to tame monsters. In a quest to regain the memories of Merc, a girl confined in a bottle, the pair embarks on a journey.\n\n(Source: MAL News)'
